html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02812025-03-05GAC
ActUnited Nations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolutions on Haiti
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS IMPLEMENTING THE UNITED NATIONS RESOLUTIONS ON HAITI in order to (1) replace the targeted arms embargo by a territorial arms embargo, as stated in UNSC Resolution 2699, thus prohibiting the supply, sale, or transfer of arms and related material to Haiti; (2) add exceptions to the arms embargo, as stated in UNSC Resolution 2700 and Resolution 2752; and (3) amend the existing definition of "military equipment" to remove the reference to "armed mercenaries".
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0078 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the REGULATIONS IMPLEMENTING THE UNITED NATIONS RESOLUTIONS ON HAITI in order to (1) replace the targeted arms embargo by a territorial arms embargo, as stated in UNSC Resolution 2699, thus prohibiting the supply, sale, or transfer of arms and related material to Haiti; (2) add exceptions to the arms embargo, as stated in UNSC Resolution 2700 and Resolution 2752; and (3) amend the existing definition of "military equipment" to remove the reference to "armed mercenaries".
